content.rendered:
A van carrying several passengers hits a tourist walking on a deserted road at night. After boarding the vehicle to take him to the nearest hospital, the passengers soon learn that there is only one very simple rule to follow: don’t sit next to him.

Directors: Raul Cerezo. Fernando Gonzalez. Gomez

Writers: Luis Sánchez-Polack. Asier. Guerricaechebarria Javier Echaniz. Raúl Cerezo

Stars: Ramiro Blas. Cecilia Suárez. Paula Gallego. Cristina Alcázar. Yao Yao. Niko Verona. Carmen Ibeas. Vasileios Papatheocharis
